Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Apartamentos Aucanada in Alcudia (Alcanada), you'll be close to Alcudia Port and San Jaume Church. This golf aparthotel is within the vicinity of Albufera Natural Park and Pollensa Port.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 45 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private balconies. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and refrigerators.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and shopping on site.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Apartamentos Aucanada, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Apartamentos Aucanada, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Alcudia Port - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
San Jaume Church - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Albufera Natural Park - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Pollensa Port - 10 km / 6.2 mi
Cala Barques - 12.8 km / 8 mi
Formentor Cape Lighthouse - 14.4 km / 9 mi
Campanet Caves - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
Ufanes Fonts - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi
Lluc Monastery - 23.5 km / 14.6 mi
Cala Agulla Beach - 28.1 km / 17.5 mi
Cala Millor Beach - 33.1 km / 20.6 mi
Castillo de Alaro - 33.4 km / 20.8 mi
Punta de N'Amer Watch Tower - 35.1 km / 21.8 mi
Puig Mayor - 36.4 km / 22.6 mi
Caves of Drach - 36.7 km / 22.8 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Aucanada is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 48.8 km / 30.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Stil Aucanada is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 48.8 km / 30.3 mi.
